parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group.

parameters.name: InnerDomainEnable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to disable the public second-level domain name.

parameters.name: InternetEnable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the virtual private cloud (VPC) second-level domain name.

parameters.name: InternetIPV6Enable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable IPv6. Valid values: **true** and **false**.

parameters.name: VpcIntranetEnable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the VPC domain name. Valid values:

*   TRUE
*   FALSE

parameters.name: VpcSlbIntranetEnable
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable the self-calling domain name.
